thread.title: Sam Smith video for new James Bond theme song released
thread.title_full: Sam Smith video for new James Bond theme song released | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: Relaxnews
title: Sam Smith video for new James Bond theme song released
text:
The video for the James Bond theme song by Sam Smith has been released, revealing the more intimate moments from the upcoming "Spectre" film.
In "Writing's on the Wall," there is a conspicuous absence of high-impact action scenes and car chases. Instead, the Luke Monaghan-directed video features the singer, along with clips of Bond played by Daniel Craig, and his two love interests played by Monica Bellucci and Lea Seydoux.
In the video for "Skyfall," singer Adele made not one appearance. Instead, the video was made up of clips from the film.
The 24th Bond film hits theaters worldwide Nov. 6.

Related Stories Sam Smith's 007 theme song tops U.K. singles chart Sam Smith unveils James Bond theme song
